# Using Statistics

This chapter will be a short intro to the most common statistical tests you will encounter in your chemistry courses. For more in-depth explanations, please check out [this useful resource.](https://www.statisticshowto.com/probability-and-statistics/)

The tests we'll be covering in this chapter are:

- Mean, median, and standard deviation
- Regression analysis and R^2
- t-test
- Z-score (test statistic)
- Pearson correlation coefficient
